response.overview: If whiteness is the beauty standard, why are certain aspects of the dark skinned women exploited and misappropriated by the entertainment industry, the beauty industry, and the mass media? The film studies media specificity of the misrepresentation of dark skin women within traditional marketing media as well as social media platforms, including Twitter, Youtube, TikTok, and Instagram.
response.tagline: If you don't see color, then you don't see her.
response.title: She Doesn't Exist
